arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشْتَرَوُا۟ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةَ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَـٰرَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText: These are	 the	people who purchased error in exchange of guidance	- so	 their	bargain did not profit them, and they did not know how to	trade.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ye wo log haiñ jinhoñ ne hidayat ke badle gumrāhi kharidi	to unka sauda	kuch	nafa'na lāya aur woh saude ki rah jānte hi na	they.

arabicText: مَثَلُهُمْ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَوْقَدَ نَارًۭا فَلَمَّآ أَضَآءَتْ مَا حَوْلَهُۥ ذَهَبَ ٱللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمْ وَتَرَكَهُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍۢ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Their example is like that of one who	
kindled a	 fire;	 and	 when it lit up	 all	that	
was	around it,	Allah took away their light	
and	 left	 them	 in	 darkness,	 unable	 to	 see	
anything.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unki	 kahāwat	 uski	 tarah	 hai	 jis	 ne	 Āag	
raushan	ki	to	jab	us	se	ās-pās	sab	jagmaga	
utha	 Allah	 unka	Noor	le	 gaya	 aur	 unheiñ	
andheriyoñ	meiñ	chord	diya	ke	kuch	nahi	
soojhta
